snippet.title: iOS / Android "SAMURAI SHODOWN 2" Trailer
snippet.description:
SAMURAI SHODOWN II, the sword-based fighting game masterpiece has finally cut its way to iOS / Android devices!
Slash the powerful adversaries standing in your path, and put a stop to Mizuki Rashojin's evil ambitions!
